#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
 double ans, n,m,dp[1005][1005], rx, bx;
 bool vis[1005][1005];
    double func(int r ,int b){
    	if(vis[r][b])
    		return dp[r][b];
    	if(r==0)
    		return b*n;
    	if(b==0)
    		return 0;
    	vis[r][b]=true;
    	double &ret=dp[r][b];
    //ret = 0;
	ret = ((double)r* (func(r- 1, b) - m) + (double)b * (func(r,b - 1) + n)) / double(r + b);
	if(ret<0.0)
		ret=0.0;
	return ret;
	}    
 int main(){
    int t;
    double x,y;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    memset(vis,false,sizeof(vis));
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    cin>>x>>y>>m>>n;
    printf("%.7f\n",func(x,y));
    }
    return 0;
    }
